name: Roll Ball (Mukul Tamsekar)
description:
My Very First LUDUM DARE!! YAY!!

Controls :

A -> Rotate LEFT

D -> Rotate RIGHT

Its a simple game, but I had fun making it.

I started a bit late on the Ludum Dare. Got only 5-6 hours to make something!

But i'm proud to have finished something.

Used Unity3d, SFXR for sound, Paint for a few textures.

Enjoy!!

Remember to leave a rating at http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=65633
